com.chaione.contexthub.sdk

Class GeofenceProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseProxy
      • com.chaione.contexthub.sdk.GeofenceProxy

  • public class GeofenceProxy
extends BaseProxy
    The Geofence Proxy is used to create, read, update, and delete geofences on ContextHub.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GeofenceProxy()

    • Method Detail

      • listGeofences

        public void listGeofences(Callback<List<Geofence>> callback)
        Gets all geofences from the ContextHub server.
        Parameters:
        callback - the callback to handle the response
        See Also:
        Callback

      • listGeofences

        public void listGeofences(double latitude,
                 double longitude,
                 int radius,
                 int limit,
                 String[] tags,
                 Callback<List<Geofence>> callback)
        Gets geofences from the ContextHub server.
        Parameters:
        latitude - the latitude for identifying nearby geofences
        longitude - the longitude for identifying nearby geofences
        radius - Radius in meters around the location which ContextHub considers "nearby". Passing 0 will use the default radius of 50 miles (80437 meters).
        limit - the number of results to return
        tags - array of tags to filter the results
        callback - the callback to handle the response
        See Also:
        Callback

      • getGeofence

        public void getGeofence(long id,
               Callback<Geofence> callback)
        Gets a geofence from ContextHub using the geofence ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the server id of the geofence
        callback - the callback to handle the response
        See Also:
        Callback

      • createGeofence

        public void createGeofence(String name,
                  double latitude,
                  double longitude,
                  int radius,
                  List<String> tags,
                  Callback<Geofence> callback)
        Creates a new geofence on the ContextHub server.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the geofence
        latitude - the latitude of the center point of the geofence
        longitude - the longitude of the center point of the geofence
        radius - the radius (in meters) of the geofence
        tags - Additional ways to label geofences. You can use tags to scope geofences to a device.
        callback - the callback to handle the response
        See Also:
        Callback

      • updateGeofence

        public void updateGeofence(long id,
                  Geofence geofence,
                  Callback<Geofence> callback)
        Updates a geofence on the ContextHub server.
        Parameters:
        id - the server id of the geofence
        geofence - the Geofence object to update
        callback - the callback to handle the response
        See Also:
        Callback

      • deleteGeofence

        public void deleteGeofence(long id,
                  Callback<Object> callback)
        Deletes an existing geofence on the ContextHub server.
        Parameters:
        id - the server id of the geofence
        callback - the callback to handle the response
        See Also:
        Callback
